title: Tornado Trainer (Foosball)
detail: Challenge your robot overlords to foosball, and use the training to dominate humans
extended_details:
Foosball "training" robot, that aims to defend and deflect away your foosball shots. Good when you dont have friends to play with, or for competitive, foosball-addicts like myself. 

*Tornado is the name of the American foosball table.
